title: The Hidden Prince
description: Revised Edition - OctoberIn a world where magic and religion clash, the Realm faces the aftermath of a near-catastrophic event. The once revered Royal Family falls under the sway of an emerging religion that glorifies the non-magical - the Barren - guided by the self-professed Vita Archon. But as the rivers run dry and famine grips the land, a desperate rebellion led by the enigmatic Lord Ascendant rises to take control. In the midst of this turmoil, Jasiel, a young ex-Prince, is hidden away in an Academy against his will. Concealing his true magical prowess, he patiently awaits graduation, longing to reunite with his long-lost parents. However, destiny has other plans for him. Unbeknownst to the Lord Ascendant, Jasiel carries a sacred Mark from the Gods, binding his fate to that of his powerful adversary.Amidst magic, deceit, and destiny, "The Hidden Prince" is a gripping tale of survival, revenge, and the enduring power of identity. As the shadows of the past and the promise of the future collide, the fate of the world hangs in the balance, and Jasiel's true purpose will be tested. THE HIDDEN PRINCE is a dark fantasy MM romance. Please be sure to read the Author's Note for trigger warnings! HEA guarantee - eventually.
author: Lyra Thornton
